scripts.less: type src\less\*.less > build\app.less.temp && lessc -x ./build/app.less.temp > ./build/css/app.css && del /f build\app.less.temp
scripts.uglify: type src\js\lib\*.js > build\app.js.temp && type src\js\*.js >> build\app.js.temp && uglifyjs2 -o build\js\app.min.js build\app.js.temp && del /f build\app.js.temp
scripts.build: npm run less && npm run uglify && npm run jade
scripts.watch: supervisor --watch src,test --extensions less,js,jade --no-restart-on exit --exec cmd -- /c npm run build
